akn:section.akn:heading: Exclusive right to name, seals, emblems, and badges

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 152907. Exclusive right to name, seals, emblems, and badges The corporation has the exclusive right to use the name “National Society, Daughters of the American Colonists” and seals, emblems, and badges the corporation adopts. This section does not affect any vested rights. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1421.)
Historical and Revision Notes
RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
15290736:2909.Oct. 30, 1984, Pub. L. 98–561, § 9, 98 Stat. 2911.
The words “established or”, “sole and”, “to have and”, “in carrying out its purposes”, and “or used” are omitted as unnecessary.
